title: Mastering Front-End Development
description: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript from scratch. Perfect for beginners aiming to become front-end developers.

instructor.name: John Doe
instructor.bio: Senior Front-End Developer with 10+ years of experience.

whatYouWillLearn: Build semantic HTML structure from scratch
Style layouts responsively using modern CSS techniques
Understand the core principles of front-end development
Debug and test front-end code efficiently

chapters.title: Intro to HTML
chapters.description: Understand the structure and purpose of HTML tags.
chapters.transcript: In this video, we cover the basic structure of an HTML page including the doctype, html, head, and body tags...

chapters.title: CSS Basics
chapters.description: Learn to apply styles, manage layouts, and use media queries.
chapters.transcript: This chapter introduces styling fundamentals using CSS properties such as color, margin, padding...

chapters.title: JavaScript Start
chapters.description: Begin using JavaScript for logic, DOM manipulation, and interactivity.
chapters.transcript: We dive into variables, conditionals, and events to create simple interactivity...

prerequisites: Familiarity with using a web browser
Willingness to learn and practice coding

title: Introduction to Python Programming
description: Start your journey in programming with Python. Learn variables, loops, conditionals, and functions through real-world problems.

instructor.name: Jane Smith
instructor.bio: Python educator and software engineer with a passion for teaching beginners.

whatYouWillLearn: Understand Python syntax and basic structures

chapters.title: Getting Started with Python
chapters.description: Learn how to install Python and write your first script.
chapters.transcript: In this module, we explore how to get started with Python installation and basic syntax...

chapters.title: Variables and Data Types
chapters.description: Understand Python variables, data types, and basic I/O.
chapters.transcript: Here we look at numbers, strings, input functions, and type conversions...

chapters.title: Loops and Conditionals
chapters.description: Control the flow of your programs with if statements and loops.
chapters.transcript: We’ll dive into `if`, `elif`, `else`, `while`, and `for` statements in real scenarios...

prerequisites: Comfortable with typing and basic computer usage

title: UI/UX Design Essentials
description: Explore the foundations of UI/UX design. Learn how to create user-friendly interfaces using modern design tools and principles.

instructor.name: Alice Johnson
instructor.bio: Product designer and UX mentor with over 7 years in digital design.

whatYouWillLearn: Use Figma or Sketch for interface design

chapters.title: Intro to UI/UX
chapters.description: Get an overview of what UI and UX really mean.
chapters.transcript: We introduce the design process and distinguish between UI and UX roles...

chapters.title: Wireframes and Layouts
chapters.description: Design clear and functional layouts using low-fidelity wireframes.
chapters.transcript: You’ll learn how to sketch out basic layouts and structure your app's information...

chapters.title: High-Fidelity Prototyping
chapters.description: Use Figma or Sketch to create high-fidelity interactive prototypes.
chapters.transcript: Now we explore clickable prototypes and how to test them with real users...

prerequisites: Basic understanding of how apps/websites work
Interest in design and user psychology
